entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
